reviews.review:
这游戏一定是十几关的教程，最后一关考试。。。
在这个各种吃配置抢眼球但是千篇一律的时代，传送门真是一股清流。
真棒~[spoiler] 头晕恶心想吐	[/spoiler]
Não deixem de jogar.
Gra łatwa, krótka i przyjemna. Mimo wszystko portala nietraktowałbym jako pełnoprawną grę, lecz jako idealne wprowadzenie do części drugiej, która jest niesamowita.
Nettes Spielchen für zwischendurch... zwischenzeitlich durchaus knifflig.
Cool concept in a bite-sized game. I would recommend it to everybody but most of all to people who never (or seldomly) play video games.

YOU HAVE TO PLAY THIS AWSOME GAME!!!
Gaming-history. Only Portal 2 is better, but you have to play this one first.
BUY IT!
WHY DONT YOU OWN IT ALREADY?

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

The cake is a lie!
Cool game tho, but only after playing the 2nd part as well

Bom
神作真心不騙！獨特的遊戲概念，搭配引人入勝的劇情，還有些小彩蛋，今日來看仍是解謎遊戲的翹楚。從頭到尾使用的道具雖然都相同，謎題卻一點都不會讓人感到乏味。遊戲長度雖短，但給人一段非常棒的時光。推薦給喜愛劇情與解謎的人！

Portal is an introductory game to Portal 2; very fun to play with and pretty quick to finish it.

You as Chell participates in series of Aperture Science Portal testing levels, with portal gun unlocked along the levels. The malevorent AI, GlaDOS wants you dead all the time [spoiler] but you beat her to get your reward, a cake. [/spoiler] 

Level design is minimalistic and well thought. I am impressed by developers' effort in teaching players on fundamentals of gameplay (motion physics) and portal gun. The story is simple yet funny.

Verdict: Grab it during Steam Sales, especially when bundled with Portal 2. It's dirt cheap. Have fun with portal!
先玩的2再补得1，总体感觉就是2的进步很大，无论是剧情长度还是关卡设计。1的话感觉难度真心有点太低了，全程几乎没卡过关，2个半小时差不多就通关了。。。

Simplemente, Valve.

SPACE

[h1] Un puzzle game decisamente UNICO NEL SUO GENERE[/h1]

Ancora una volta, [b]Valve[/b] riesce a stupire con uno dei suoi titoli.

[h1]TRAMA[/h1]
Ci risvegliamo in una strana struttura...guidati da una voce metallica e lontana;armati di una [i]Portal Gun[/i] veniamo sottoposti a vari test che metteranno alla prova la nostra astuzia e la nostra rapidità nel pensare. [i](Preferisco non dare ulteriori informazioni sulla storia, in quanto la si scopre facendosi strada attraverso i livelli.)[/i]

[h1]GRAFICA & AUDIO[/h1]
Grafica notevole, considerando l' "età" del gioco. In particolare il doppiaggio merita un risconoscimento speciale. In più, come ciliegina sulla [i]torta[/i], la canzone dei riconoscimenti, scritta e musicata unicamente per il gioco e la sua storia.

[h1]GAMEPLAY[/h1]
Le meccaniche di gioco sono spettacolari: grazie alla nostra [i]Portal Gun[/i] saremo in grado di creare dei portali [i](un portale d'ingresso e uno d'uscita)[/i], appunto, su pavimenti,muri e soffitti. I portali non sono solo essenziali al completamento dei livelli, bensì offrono grande libertà di movimento all'interno di essi e sono stati progettati in modo da avere un "fisica" vera e propria. [i](Es. La velocità con cui si entra in un portale viene conservata all'uscita di quest' ultimo.)[/i]

[i]Che dire...sono riusciti a trasformare un puzzle game,spesso considerati noiosi, in un esperienza stimolante e avvincente grazie a meccaniche sbalorditive e una trama che cattura l'attenzione del giocatore.[/i]

I play alot of games in my life and in my experience every game has a negative aspect of it heck even the ones that are critically acclaimed has it own shortcomings. But portal its different i dont have  any negative remarks of it seriously this game is absolutely perfect. The pacing is perfect, the transition difficulty of the puzzle is perfect, the writing is perfect and funny , Glados is the  best passive aggressive villain of the series  and valve franchise as a whole, the portal is innovative and not gimmicky at all, and the most beautiful ending credit scene i have ever seen in video game heck there not even a crash or glitch i've ever encounter while playing it. This is the definition of a perfect game.

Fantastic！只有惊艳二字足以形容这个游戏！作为一个刚开始学习游戏制作的大学僧这游戏的物理引擎实在是无法想象这是十几年前的水平，而关卡的设计更是让我不由得生敬，在现在这个把画质美术看得越来越重要的时代里，单凭创意与简单基础却又万用的游戏机制，在一个个水泥房间之间穿梭，简陋的模型之下却是藏着策划精雕细琢后想出的趣味十足的关卡，看似朴实，实则煞费心机，容我向制作组们给予最高的敬意！

由于我才刚开始玩，所以不再做更多的笔墨，等到我彻底通关之后再来一点点叙述_(:зゝ∠)_

Portal is an incredible journey through Apeture Science Laboratories. I know who you play as, and I know many facts about this game, but for the sake of reviewing just THIS game, I will review this as if I've only played through the first game.

You are a new test subject in Apeture Science Labs, testing the Portal gun (which is worth more than all the people in Subject Town 1 combined!) You will be going through 19 incredible puzzles, while being accompanied by GLaDOS, a computer/robot that appears to be in charge of running the experiments.

For those looking for a quick review, here you go. Portal is funny, entertaining, challenging, but not too difficult to the point you get angry. It's got a small story to follow, it's not too long, and the music is incredible. You will love this if you're even slightly a fan of puzzle games.

Now, for those looking for the full review, let's get into it.

One quick thing to note: I love first-person Valve games like Half-Life and Portal because they contain environmental puzzles, and I absolutely love these. They are far more entertaining than puzzles normally found in games. I struggle to explain this, but if you've played through Half-Life/Half-Life 2, you'll know what I mean. The puzzles are built into the area around you, and the puzzle is trying to get past an obstacle.

Now, I don't have a bunch to say about this game, because it is a rather short game (unless you attempt the Bonus Maps, which I'll talk about later). Still, this game is incredible for a few reasons. This game is humorous. GLaDOS is a very strange, creepy companion-ish robot that guides you through the puzzles. As you progress through, she begins to sound more corrupted and strange, and you'll learn what's going on once you reach the end of the game, which I am not spoiling. Even when she does sound more distorted, she has satire comments to give you, and it's all hilarious.

The puzzles themselves are a blast, and are the highlight of this game. There are multiple types of puzzles, and the obvious thing that makes this game different than others is the fact that you have a Portal Gun. This weapon allows you to create two portals, which connect to each other. This leads to a lot of physics-based and momentum puzzles. The puzzles are rather easy, while still being challenging in the sense that you will have to think about some, but not to the point that you get frustrated with it.

There's 19 test chambers, not counting the multiple puzzles within the innerworkings of the lab. There's plenty of hidden secrets and references in this game. There's secret areas where a mysterious man tries to explain how the cake that GLaDOS taunts the player with is a lie, in the sense that she is trying to kill you. He's a crazy man who managed to break into the innerworkings of the test chambers. While doing this, he had a Companion Cube with him, which he fell in love with. So clearly, he's crazy, and it's up to you whether or not you believe him when his scribbles say that GLaDOS is lying to you.

I didn't go in depth on the puzzles for the simple fact that they're all unique, and it's something better experienced, rather than read. The same goes for the music, which is absolutely amazing. The highlight song of the game though is "Still Alive" which plays during the credits, and reveals more information about GLaDOS. This song is catchy, and sounds incredible.

Now, as far as completion rewards, there's achievments, which are always satisfying. You get a new Main Menu scene for when you beat the game, which is nice. You also have access to all of the Bonus Challenges, which is where most of your time in this game will come from.

The Bonus Challenges come in three catagories- Least Portals, Least Steps, and Least Time. You can do these challenges for Chambers 13-18, and earn all Gold rankings on them, which gives you some more achievments. I personally haven't finished completing them all, but it's something fun to do if you really love this game.

To conclude, I loved this game from start to finish. There was never a dull moment, or a time where I was getting bored. I also like the fact that it's short enough to complete in one sitting. The puzzles are a blast, GLaDOS is hilarious, and the music is great. I'd gladly give Portal a [b]10/10[/b].

[h1]Details[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]The computer is your friend: obey the computer and stay alive.[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1751045422 
Essentially a tech-demo puzzle game where you navigate chambers by opening doorways with your science gun.
The mechanic of portals is simple but became a phenomenon.
[/quote]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]An amazing gameplay mechanic, it plays well-beyond the tech-demo foundation into a truly iconic experience.[/h1]
Pros:
- we all love chell
- the comedy is as dark as a dead monitor
- death is trivialised to absurdity here
- the end-song rules
- the music is incredible throughout

Cons:
- too short
- not as good as sequel, if you had to pick just one.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1748238549 
[/quote]

Portal真的是一款非常需要動腦的遊戲，而像我這種解謎能力比較差的人就卡關卡了好久
除了能享受解決遊戲中的謎題帶來的樂趣和成就感，遊戲中那劇情故事也是耐人尋味
當我玩到需要親手解決同伴方塊的時候，我甚至有想過就這樣關掉遊戲好了
畢竟在遊戲的過程中，並不會有同伴這種東西，孤獨程度堪比在輻射過後的避難所裡面度過幾十年
甚至還會有一隻很愛撒謊的機娘送你去死，和一些勢必殺死你的炮塔娘
玩到遊戲最後的BOSS戰真的非常有創意，他教會了我戰鬥不一要用武器
不過由於時間限制的問題，我也玩了好幾次才能破關，還聽到了那首可愛的歌Still Alive
